name: vault
description: File encryption and decryption cli tool written in go

scripts.build: go build -o vault -ldflags="-X main.Version=$npm_package_version -X main.Commit=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" cmd/main.go
scripts.dev: nodemon -w ./cmd -w ./internal -w ./pkg --ext *.go -x "npm run test && npm run build"

author: NobleMajo
